author: Mygod
source:
-- HUMAN RESOURCE MACHINE PROGRAM --
-- 28-Three-Sort - SIZE 96/34 - SPEED 52/78 --

-- This solution is level-specific (patterned and quantity-limited input).
-- The input SHALL consists of 4 tuples, and the first 3 should be in reverse
-- order, the 2nd should be in order.
-- Heavily based on 62.73-AlanDeSmet.asm.

    INBOX   
    COPYTO   0
    INBOX   
    COPYTO   1
    INBOX   
    OUTBOX
    COPYFROM 1
    OUTBOX
    COPYFROM 0
    OUTBOX
    INBOX
    OUTBOX
    INBOX
    OUTBOX
    INBOX
    OUTBOX
    INBOX   
    COPYTO   0
    INBOX   
    COPYTO   1
    SUB      0
    JUMPN    i
    COMMENT  1
    INBOX   
    SUB      0
    JUMPN    h
    COMMENT  7
    ADD      0
    COPYTO   2
    SUB      1
    JUMPN    g
    COMMENT  9
    COPYFROM 0
    OUTBOX  
    COPYFROM 1
    OUTBOX  
    COPYFROM 2
    OUTBOX  
    JUMP     a
g:
    COMMENT  8
    COPYFROM 0
    OUTBOX  
    COPYFROM 2
    OUTBOX  
    COPYFROM 1
    OUTBOX  
    JUMP     a
h:
    COMMENT  6
    ADD      0
    OUTBOX  
    COPYFROM 0
    OUTBOX  
    COPYFROM 1
    OUTBOX  
    JUMP     a
i:
    COMMENT  0
    INBOX   
    SUB      1
    JUMPN    k
    COMMENT  3
    ADD      1
    COPYTO   2
    SUB      0
    JUMPN    j
    COMMENT  4
    COPYFROM 1
    OUTBOX  
    COPYFROM 0
    OUTBOX  
    COPYFROM 2
    OUTBOX  
    JUMP     a
j:
    COMMENT  5
    COPYFROM 1
    OUTBOX  
    COPYFROM 2
    OUTBOX  
    COPYFROM 0
    OUTBOX  
    JUMP     a
k:
    COMMENT  2
    ADD      1
    OUTBOX  
    COPYFROM 1
    OUTBOX  
    COPYFROM 0
    OUTBOX  
a:
    INBOX   
    COPYTO   0
    INBOX   
    COPYTO   1
    SUB      0
    JUMPN    i
    COMMENT  1
    INBOX   
    SUB      0
    JUMPN    h
    COMMENT  7
    ADD      0
    COPYTO   2
    SUB      1
    JUMPN    g
    COMMENT  9
    COPYFROM 0
    OUTBOX  
    COPYFROM 1
    OUTBOX  
    COPYFROM 2
    OUTBOX
